pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Species N-Mixture (MNM) Models with 'nimble' // Simulating data and fitting multi-species N-mixture models using 'nimble'. Includes features for handling zero-inflation and temporal correlation, Bayesian inference, model diagnostics, parameter estimation, and predictive checks. Designed for ecological studies with zero-altered or time-series data. Mimnagh, N., Parnell, A., Prado, E., Moral, R. A. (2022) doi:10.1007/s10651-022-00542-7. Royle, J. A. (2004) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.2004.00142.x.
